key.name: panel-position
key.description: Panel is shown on the Bottom or Top of the screen.

key.name: panel-size
key.description: Set the size of the panel.

key.name: dot-position
key.description: Running indicators are shown on the Bottom or Top of the screen.

key.name: dot-style-focused
key.description: Style of the running indicator for the icon for the currently focused application

key.name: dot-style-unfocused
key.description: Style of the running indicator for the icon for applications which are not currently focused

key.name: dot-color-override
key.description: Whether to override the theme background color for .app-well-running-dot

key.name: dot-color-1
key.description: Customize the color of the running indicator when one window is running for that application

key.name: dot-color-2
key.description: Customize the color of the running indicator when two windows are running for that application

key.name: dot-color-3
key.description: Customize the color of the running indicator when three windows are running for that application

key.name: dot-color-4
key.description: Customize the color of the running indicator when four or more windows are running for that application

key.name: dot-color-unfocused-different
key.summary: Unfocused color is different than focused
key.description: Whether to apply a 2nd color scheme to the indicator when the app is not focused

key.name: dot-color-unfocused-1
key.summary: Color of unfocused running indicator (1 window)
key.description: Customize the color of the unfocused running indicator when one window is running for that application

key.name: dot-color-unfocused-2
key.summary: Color of unfocused running indicator (2 windows)
key.description: Customize the color of the unfocused running indicator when two windows are running for that application

key.name: dot-color-unfocused-3
key.summary: Color of unfocused running indicator (3 windows)
key.description: Customize the color of the unfocused running indicator when three windows are running for that application

key.name: dot-color-unfocused-4
key.summary: Color of unfocused running indicator (4+ windows)
key.description: Customize the color of the unfocused running indicator when four or more windows are running for that application

key.name: dot-size
key.description: Height of the running indicator line/diameter of window indicator dots

key.name: focus-highlight
key.description: Whether to highlight the background of the currently focused application's icon

key.name: focus-highlight-color
key.summary: Color of highlight of focused application
key.description: Customize the color of the highlight of the focused application

key.name: focus-highlight-opacity
key.summary: Opacity of highlight of focused application
key.description: Customize the opacity of the highlight of the focused application

key.name: stockgs-keep-dash
key.description: Whether to keep the stock gnome-shell dash while in overview

key.name: stockgs-panelbtn-click-only
key.description: Whether to activate the panel menu buttons on hover or on click

key.name: location-clock
key.description: Set the location of the clock on the taskbar

key.name: taskbar-position
key.description: Set the position of the taskbar on the panel

key.name: taskbar-locked
key.description: Specifies if the user can modify the taskbar

key.name: trans-use-custom-bg
key.description: Replace current theme background color for the panel

key.name: trans-bg-color
key.description: Custom background color for the panel

key.name: trans-use-custom-opacity
key.description: Replace current theme background color for the panel

key.name: trans-use-dynamic-opacity
key.description: Enable dynamic opacity

key.name: trans-panel-opacity
key.description: Custom opacity for the panel

key.name: trans-dynamic-behavior
key.description: Dictates which window type affects the panel opacity

key.name: trans-dynamic-distance
key.description: The distance a window needs to be from the panel to change opacity

key.name: trans-dynamic-anim-target
key.description: Modified opacity for the panel when a window is near

key.name: trans-dynamic-anim-time
key.description: The duration of the animation when the opacity changes

key.name: trans-use-custom-gradient
key.description: Replace current theme gradient for the panel

key.name: trans-gradient-top-color
key.description: Custom gradient top color for the panel

key.name: trans-gradient-top-opacity
key.description: Custom gradient top opacity for the panel

key.name: trans-gradient-bottom-color
key.description: Custom gradient bottom color for the panel

key.name: trans-gradient-bottom-opacity
key.description: Custom gradient bottom opacity for the panel

key.name: intellihide
key.description: Whether to intelligently hide the panel

key.name: intellihide-hide-from-windows
key.description: Dictates if the dash should only hide when in conflict with windows

key.name: intellihide-behaviour
key.description: Dictates how to intelligently hide the panel

key.name: intellihide-use-pressure
key.description: To reveal the panel, pressure needs to be applied to the edege of the screen

key.name: intellihide-pressure-threshold
key.description: The pressure needed to reveal the panel

key.name: intellihide-pressure-time
key.description: The numer of milliseconds that the pressure needs to be applied to reveal the panel

key.name: intellihide-show-in-fullscreen
key.description: Allow the panel to be revealed while an application is in fullscreen mode

key.name: intellihide-only-secondary
key.description: Whether to only hide secondary panels

key.name: intellihide-animation-time
key.description: The animation time (ms) to hide and reveal the panel

key.name: intellihide-close-delay
key.description: The delay (ms) before hiding the panel

key.name: intellihide-key-toggle-text
key.description: Keybinding to reveal the panel while in intellihide mode

key.name: intellihide-key-toggle
key.description: Keybinding to reveal the panel while in intellihide mode

key.name: show-show-apps-button
key.description: Show appplications button in the dash

key.name: show-apps-icon-file
key.description: Customize the Show Applications icon

key.name: show-apps-icon-side-padding
key.description: Customize the Show Applications icon side padding

key.name: animate-show-apps
key.summary: Animate Show Applications from the desktop
key.description: Animate Show Applications from the desktop

key.name: show-activities-button
key.description: Show activities button on the left hand side of the taskbar

key.name: show-showdesktop-button
key.description: Show button on right side of bar that minimizes/restores all visible windows on current workspace

key.name: showdesktop-button-width
key.description: Customize the width of the show Desktop button

key.name: show-showdesktop-hover
key.description: Show the desktop on mouse hover

key.name: show-showdesktop-delay
key.description: Delay before showing the desktop

key.name: show-showdesktop-time
key.description: Window fade animation time when showing the destop

key.name: show-appmenu
key.description: Show appMenu on the right hand side of the panel

key.name: show-window-previews
key.description: Show preview of running window on hover of app icon

key.name: show-tooltip
key.description: Show tooltip on hover of app icon

key.name: show-favorites
key.description: Show or hide favorite appplications icons in the dash

key.name: show-window-previews-timeout
key.description: Amount of time after entering icon to wait before displaying window preview if icon is not clicked or mouse has not left.

key.name: peek-mode
key.description: Peek a window upon hover for some time

key.name: window-preview-show-title
key.description: Display window title in preview

key.name: window-preview-width
key.description: The width of the window previews

key.name: window-preview-height
key.description: The height of the window previews

key.name: window-preview-padding
key.description: The padding of the window previews

key.name: isolate-workspaces
key.description: Dash shows only windows from the current workspace

key.name: group-apps
key.description: Dash groups the application instances under the same icon

key.name: group-apps-label-font-size
key.description: When the applications are ungrouped, this defines the application titles font size.

key.name: group-apps-label-font-weight
key.description: When the applications are ungrouped, this defines font weight of application titles. Supported values: inherit (from theme), normal, lighter, bold and bolder.

key.name: group-apps-label-font-color
key.description: When the applications are ungrouped, this defines the application titles font color.

key.name: group-apps-label-max-width
key.description: When the applications are ungrouped, this defines the application titles maximum width.

key.name: group-apps-use-fixed-width
key.summary: Use a fixed width for the application titles
key.description: The application titles all have the same width, even if their texts are shorter than the maximum width. The maximum width value is used as the fixed width.

key.name: group-apps-underline-unfocused
key.summary: Display running indicators on unfocused applications
key.description: When the applications are ungrouped, this defines if running applications should display an indicator.

key.name: group-apps-use-launchers
key.summary: Use favorite icons as application launchers
key.description: When the applications are ungrouped, this defines if running applications stay separate from the favorite icons.

key.name: primary-monitor
key.description: Specifies the index of the primary monitor (-1 = GNOME Primary Monitor).

key.name: multi-monitors
key.description: Specifies if a panel is shown on every monitors

key.name: isolate-monitors
key.description: Dash shows only windows from the current monitor

key.name: show-clock-all-monitors
key.summary: Display the clock on all monitors
key.description: Specifies if every panel should display the clock. If false, the clock is only displayed on the primary monitor.

key.name: show-status-menu-all-monitors
key.summary: Display the status menu on all monitors
key.description: Specifies if every panel should display the status menu. If false, the status menu is only displayed on the primary monitor.

key.name: show-favorites-all-monitors
key.summary: Display the favorites on all monitors
key.description: Specifies if every panel should display the favorite applications. If false, the favorite appplications are only displayed on the primary monitor.

key.name: customize-click
key.description: Customize action on various mouse events

key.name: click-action
key.summary: Action when clicking on a running app
key.description: Set the action that is executed when clicking on the icon of a running application

key.name: shift-click-action
key.summary: Action when shift+clicking on a running app
key.description: Set the action that is executed when shift+clicking on the icon of a running application

key.name: middle-click-action
key.summary: Action when clicking on a running app
key.description: Set the action that is executed when middle-clicking on the icon of a running application

key.name: shift-middle-click-action
key.summary: Action when clicking on a running app
key.description: Set the action that is executed when shift+middle-clicking on the icon of a running application

key.name: leave-timeout
key.description: Amount of time to leave preview windows open when the mouse has left the application's icon.

key.name: enter-peek-mode-timeout
key.description: Amount of time of inactivity to enter the window peeking mode when the mouse has entered a window preview.

key.name: peek-mode-opacity
key.description: All windows except for the peeked one have their opacity set to the same value.

key.name: preview-middle-click-close
key.summary: Middle click preview to close window
key.description: Middle click on the window preview to close that window

key.name: tray-size
key.description: Set the size of the tray font. (0 for default)

key.name: leftbox-size
key.description: Set the size of the leftBox font. (0 for default)

key.name: appicon-margin
key.description: Set the margin for application icons in the embedded dash.

key.name: appicon-padding
key.description: Set the padding for application icons in the embedded dash.

key.name: tray-padding
key.description: Set the size of the tray padding. (-1 for default)

key.name: leftbox-padding
key.description: Set the size of the leftBox padding. (-1 for default)

key.name: status-icon-padding
key.description: Set the size of the aggregate (status) menu icon padding. (-1 for default)

key.name: animate-app-switch
key.summary: Animate running indicator when open/closing/switching applications

key.name: secondarymenu-contains-appmenu
key.summary: Integrate items from the gnome appmenu into the right click menu

key.name: secondarymenu-contains-showdetails
key.summary: Display Show Details to open Gnome Software from right click menu

key.name: shortcut-text
key.summary: Keybinding to show the dock and the number overlay.
key.description: Behavior depends on hotkeys-show-dock and hotkeys-overlay.

key.name: shortcut
key.summary: Keybinding to show the dock and the number overlay.
key.description: Behavior depends on hotkeys-show-dock and hotkeys-overlay.

key.name: shortcut-timeout
key.summary: Timeout to hide the dock, in seconds
key.description: Sets the time duration before the dock is hidden again.

key.name: overlay-timeout
key.summary: Timeout to hide the dock, in seconds
key.description: Sets the time duration before the dock is hidden again.

key.name: hotkeys-overlay-combo
key.description: You can choose between NEVER, TEMPORARILY and ALWAYS.

key.name: hot-keys
key.description: Launch and switch between dash items using Super+(0-9)

key.name: hotkey-prefix-text
key.description: You can choose between Super or SuperAlt as the prefix for hotkeys.

key.name: shortcut-previews
key.description: When multiple instances of the application are available, show their window previews

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-1
key.description: Keybinding to launch 1st app.

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-2
key.description: Keybinding to launch 2nd app.

key.description: Keybinding to launch 3rd app.

key.description: Keybinding to launch 4th app.

key.description: Keybinding to launch 9th app.

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-10
key.description: Keybinding to launch 10th app.

key.summary: Keybinding to trigger 1st dash app with shift behavior
